concise_definition: n. （专有名词）莱尔（常见英文姓氏或人名）

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname or given name in English-speaking countries, with no inherent generic meaning outside of personal identification.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作英语国家的姓氏或名字，除作为个人身份标识外，无其他通用含义。
definitions.example_en: Lyle Stevenson is the author of several acclaimed historical novels.
definitions.example_cn: 莱尔·史蒂文森是数部广受赞誉的历史小说的作者。
